name: Auditing_Sept.2023
description: The Auditing Collection encompasses the skills required for professionals responsible for conducting audits and ensuring financial integrity within an organization. It targets roles such as Auditors or Internal Auditors. This collection focuses on various auditing skills including accounting, auditing, financial analysis, internal controls, research, communications, among many other skills. It is aligned with industry standards, such as the Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) certification.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
